title: Your Vice Is a Locked Room and Only I Have the Key
actors: Edwige Fenech,Anita Strindberg,Luigi Pistilli,Ivan Rassimov,Angela La Vorgna,Enrica Bonaccorti,Daniela Giordano,Ermelinda De Felice,Marco Mariani,Nerina Montagnani,Carla Mancini,Bruno Boschetti,Franco Nebbia,Riccardo Salvino,Dalila Di Lazzaro,Leslie Daniels,Andy Luotto,Edward Mannix,Susan Spafford,Frank von Kuegelgen
summary: A burned out, abusive, alcoholic writer named Oliviero lives with his wife, Irina, at their estate in Venice, along with his late mother's mysterious black cat, Satan. To pass the time, Oliviero hosts parties for the local hippies, humiliating Irina in front of his guests. When his mistress is murdered, police suspect Oliviero, and things get complicated when his young, beautiful and self-confident niece, Floriana, pays an unexpected visit.

title: The Things of Life
actors: Michel Piccoli,Romy Schneider,Lea Massari,Gérard Lartigau,Jean Bouise,Boby Lapointe,Hervé Sand,Jacques Richard,Betty Beckers,Dominique Zardi,Gabrielle Doulcet,Roger Crouzet,Henri Nassiet,Claude Confortès,Jerry Brouer,Jean Gras,Marie-Pierre Casey,Marcelle Arnold,Jean-Pierre Zola,Max Amyl,Isabelle Sadoyan,Gérard Streiff
summary: The mind of Pierre Bérard, a successful middle-aged architect, is torn between his unstable present with Hélène, his younger lover, and his happy memories of the past with Catherine, his ex-wife; but his true destiny awaits him at a crossroads on his way to Rennes…

title: Welcome to New York
actors: Gérard Depardieu,Jacqueline Bisset,Drena De Niro,Amy Ferguson,Paul Calderon,Paul Hipp,Ronald Guttman,Jackie Raynal,Shanyn Leigh,Frank Aquilino,Eddy Shalita,Anna Lakomy,Samantha Opitz,Ilinca Kiss,Charlotte Silvera,Kathryn Lill,Caroline Huet,Lucy Campbell,Raquel Nave,Natasha Romanova,Victoria Reton,Pamela Afesi,Nneoma Nkuku,Marie Mouté,JD Taylor,Louis Zaneri,James Heaphy,Pascal Yen-Pfister,Brooke Chaffee,Show All…
summary: Fiction inspired from the story of the rise and fall of French politician and former head of the International Monetary Fund, Dominique Strauss-Kahn.
